name: Infections version 0.4
description:
Credits

Special thanks to all who participated in this jam.

Game Designers:

Olteanu

Boggy (DreamNxtGen - itch.io)

Programmers:

Olteanu

evillord 

AlwalidX

Artists:

Olteanu

Boggy (DreamNxtGen - itch.io)

Audio Manager:

OhNoPhoton

This is the team ho made this game possible.

The game is about a revolutionary medicine, which can fix any infection, by sacrificing a special cell, which can replace any human tissue. Is more story behind this Game, but we did not have the time to add all details, so we came only with the mechanic of the game.

This cell can be controlled by player, to reach his target. By using  this Keys:

W,A,S,D  and arrow keys as well.

Additional key for jumping is space as well.

Every cell is unique, they have special abilities, and to make the difference we change their colors. 

We have also the checkpoint, we can add a checkpoint by pressing L. When cell ability dont help, we can kill it by pressing K.
